metadata.description: Called back from retirement to command a brigade of remorseless criminals, Captain Ivro has more than just their mission in mind — he's in search of some redemption as well.  Tasked with exploring a realm fragmented by a mysterious mist that seemingly braids new worlds into their own, they must set aside their wartime rivalry with the Dark Elves to combat the common dangers that grow in the wake of this spreading evil.  But nothing is more dangerous than a brigade of men who can't be trusted...
metadata.name: Brigada
